actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution relative to determining a telecommunications regulatory policy.

summary.text: States that this Congress should expeditiously determine the future telecommunications policy of this Nation. Calls for a moratorium on any further implementation of new telecommunications policies by the Federal Communications Commission until the 95th Congress has completed its study on the matter and determined the appropriate national telecommunications regulatory policy or adjourned sine die.

titles.title: Resolution relative to determining a telecommunications regulatory policy.
